section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM
FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
full_product_description: Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of Electrical Motor driven main pump, VERTICAL TURBINE type, capable of deliver 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The bowl assembly shall consist of suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column. Column depth shall be minimum 4.5 mtr. Pump shall be coupled with TEFC motor of suitable KW with speed of 1450 RPM with all accessories. The quoted rate shall include all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor. Civil foundation like mounting base etc will be client's scope. (FOR HYDRANT SYSTEM)
size: capacity: 410 M3/HR, head: 105 MWC, column depth: minimum 4.5 mtr, speed: 1450 RPM
feature_or_specifications: drive: electrical motor, coupling: TEFC motor, accessories: all fixing parts necessary to couple the pump with motor, bowl assembly: suction bell, impellers, bowl shaft and column, application: hydrant system

section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM
FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
full_product_description: Supply, erection,testing & commissioning of diesel engine driven stand by pump, centrifugal horizontal type with gland packing and capable  of delivering 410 M3/HR at 105 MWC. The pump shall be coupled to suitable HP of Diesel Engine radiator water cooled type having speed of 1500 RPM with all accessories including diesel engine control panel and complete set shall be mounted on common base frame.Other accessories viz Batteries & battery leads with stand, fuel tank(for 4 hrs operation) with stand and gauge glass, fuel piping with valves etc to be supplied. The quoted rate shall include radiator water cooling piping(if required), coupling guard and other standard accessories, RCC foundation(as recommended by manufacturer) and foundation bolts, etc, complete ( civil foundation shall be client's scope).
